MADE IN BRITAIN

A game changer in
the ethical fight against
Covid-19

Textiles are one of the main vectors for viruses and bacteria.
Textiles treat with HeiQ viroblock help stop cross- contamination
from surface to face covering.

The Unique properties of our 1TCA mask

British public is required to wear a face mask when on trains, in shops and any
enclosed space, 1TcA has launched the first.

HeiQ viroblock works to deactivate.
the virus with minutes and effective for
30 washes.

ENHANCED WITH HEIQ VIROBLOCK

The UK’s First Fully Recyclable &
Sustainable Face Mask

At a time when the British public is required to wear a face mask
when on trains, in shops and any enclosed space, 1TcA has
launched the first British made reusable, sustainable face masks
and snoods, manufactured using GRS fabric, woven from
recycled waste plastic and treated.

Learn More

5 Reasons to use
1TcA Masks

  • Enhanced with HeiQ Viroblock
  • Reduces cross contamination from hand to face covering
  • Sustanable – protecting you and your planet
  • British Manufacturing – helping the economy
  • Cost-effective with all profits donated to
    our chosen charities
